CustomField.description: Checks whether any items are missing on the Single Barrel cases. This is used to send the missing items and PO reminder emails.
CustomField.formula: AND( ISBLANK (SAP_Number__c ), CASE( Brand__c, "Knob Creek", IF( OR( !Purchase_Order_Uploaded__c, !Bottle_Text_Entered__c, !POS_Items_Selected__c, AND( !Barrel_Selected__c, ISPICKVAL( Type, "Sample Kit" ))), 1, 0), "Makers Mark", IF( OR( AND( !Purchase_Order_Uploaded__c, !ISBLANK ( SKU_from_Barrel__c )), !Bottle_Text_Entered__c, AND( !Barrel_Selected__c, ISPICKVAL( Type, "Remote Selection" ))), 1, 0), "El Tesoro", IF( OR( !Bottle_Text_Entered__c, !POS_Items_Selected__c, AND( !Purchase_Order_Uploaded__c, !ISBLANK ( SKU_from_Barrel__c ))), 1, 0), 0) == 1 )
CustomField.label: Missing Items?
